item.description:
Meet up with other like-minded Atheist people at Orlean's in Davis square for dinner, drinks, and conversation.

Take this as a monthly chance to meet new people or catch up with your friends in the group.

Orleans is a quiet restaurant in Davis with great seafood, pasta, and an excellent bar.
item.how_to_find_us: If you're early, look for Winfield. Otherwise, find the tables in the back.
item.name: Atheist Social @ Orleans
